objects.name: WelcomeText
objects.string:
Welcome! 
Enter the following ID on another client to connect:






          Or enter the ID from another client here:

events.comment: When a peer is connected, confirm connection and switch to the game
Switch to the game once connection is confirmed
Make sure both clients are on the same game
Make sure newest message is always visible by removing older messages when the text box is updated

objects.name: disconnected
objects.string:
You have been disconnected 
from the other game instance!

objects.name: pressAnyKey
objects.string: Press any key to return to connection screen

eventsFunctionsExtensions.author: @Bouh, @arthuro555
eventsFunctionsExtensions.description: This extension adds tools to access the clipboard. It only works on Windows, macOS, Linux and web browsers.
eventsFunctionsExtensions.name: Clipboard
eventsFunctionsExtensions.shortDescription: Expression returning the content of the clipboard.

eventsFunctions.description:
Read the text from the clipboard asynchronously. As this is "asynchronous", this means that the variable won't be immediately filled with the text from the clipboard. Instead, it will be filled a few milliseconds later.

Note also that on some platforms (like on web browsers), the user will be asked for permissions to read from the clipboard.

This only works on Windows, macOS, Linux and web browsers.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Get text from the clipboard (Windows, macOS, Linux, web browser)
eventsFunctions.name: ReadTextCrossPlaform
eventsFunctions.sentence: Read clipboard and store text in _PARAM1_

parameters.description: Callback variable where to store the result
parameters.name: callback

eventsFunctions.description: Read the text from the clipboard (Windows, macOS, Linux only)
eventsFunctions.fullName: Get text from the clipboard (Windows, macOS, Linux)
eventsFunctions.name: ReadText

events.comment: This is here for retrocompatibility. Try to use the asynchronous readTextCrossPlatform action instead.

events.inlineCode:
const electron = runtimeScene.getGame().getRenderer().getElectron();
if (electron && electron.clipboard) eventsFunctionContext.returnValue = electron.clipboard.readText();

eventsFunctions.description: Write the text in the clipboard (Windows, macOS, Linux, web browser only)
eventsFunctions.fullName: Write text to the clipboard (Windows, macOS, Linux, web browser)
eventsFunctions.name: WriteText

eventsFunctionsExtensions.author: Arthur Pacaud (arthuro555)
eventsFunctionsExtensions.description: Have multiple expressions that remove unwanted characters from a string (non-alphanumerical characters, new Lines...)
eventsFunctionsExtensions.name: Sanitizer

eventsFunctions.description: Removes every non-alphanumerical characters of a string.
eventsFunctions.name: sanitize

eventsFunctions.description: Cuts a string to be sure it doesn't exxceeds a maximum size
eventsFunctions.name: trim

parameters.description: The size to limit the string to
parameters.name: size

eventsFunctions.description: Replaces every new line character with a space
eventsFunctions.name: removeNewLines

parameters.description: The text to remove new lines from
parameters.name: text

eventsFunctions.description: Count the number of lines in a string
eventsFunctions.name: countNewLines

parameters.description: The text to count lines from
parameters.name: text

parameters.description: String to remove the first line from
parameters.name: text
